name: another reverie
description:
my third game! created for the gardens of vextro anthology.

NOTE: this version of the game uses the maniacs patch for rpg maker 2003, while the version in the gardens of vextro page does not. there are a couple practical differences between the two, but to sum it up, this is the actual definitive version of the game that you should play.

...however, the patch changes things in the game's RPG_RT.exe file that causes it to be flagged as a virus by certain antiviruses, including the one itch uses. mind, there are no viruses in the game. but if you don't trust me, you can instead play the version in the gardens of vextro page.
